sentences.en: A permit is required for fishing in the canal.
sentences.cn: 在运河中钓鱼要有许可证。

sentences.en: Circumstances do not permit me to help you [ my helpingyou ] .
sentences.cn: 情况不 许可 我帮助你.

sentences.en: Do not permit children to indulge in superfluities until esqsentials are met.
sentences.cn: 在孩子们未抓住要点之前别让他们过于注意细节.

sentences.en: He can let the court's decision stand and permit the execution.
sentences.cn: 他有权维持法庭判决，批准死刑生效。

sentences.en: He had more than the permitted level of alcohol in his blood.
sentences.cn: 他血液中的酒精含量超出了允许的水平。

sentences.en: His illness would not permit that he ( should ) work hard.
sentences.cn: 病魔不允许他辛苦工作.

sentences.en: I couldn't face the whole rigmarole of getting a work permit again.
sentences.cn: 我无法再次面对获取工作许可证所需的各种冗长复杂的手续。

sentences.en: I don't permit you to cast aspersions on my friend.
sentences.cn: 我不许你诽谤我的朋友.

sentences.en: Papa would not permit the waste of a single drop of water.
sentences.cn: 爸爸不允许浪费一滴水.

sentences.en: permit me to correct you.
sentences.cn: 请允许我纠正你的错误。

sentences.en: Permit me to give you some advice.
sentences.cn: 请允许我给你提点建议。

sentences.en: Permit me to offer you my sincere congratulations.
sentences.cn: 谨致衷心祝贺。

sentences.en: Smoking is only permitted in the public lounge.
sentences.cn: 只允许在公共休息室里抽烟。

sentences.en: The doctor will not permit mother up until her leg is better.
sentences.cn: 在母亲的腿好些之前,医生不允许她起床.

sentences.en: The ethics of his profession don't permit him to do that.
sentences.cn: 他的职业道德不允许他那样做.

sentences.en: The soldiers had orders to permit no stranger through.
sentences.cn: 士兵们接到命令不许任何陌生人通过.

sentences.en: The state does not permit write-in votes.
sentences.cn: 该州不允许投票给非推荐候选人。

sentences.en: We will have our meeting here, if you permit us.
sentences.cn: 如果你允许的话,我们的会就在这里开.

sentences.en: weather permitting, guests can dine outside on the veranda.
sentences.cn: 天气许可的话，客人可以在外面的阳台上就餐。

sentences.en: Will they permit you to sit in on a few classes?
sentences.cn: 他们会同意你旁听几节课吗？

words.tran_cn: 许可的；自由的；宽容的；（两性关系）放纵的

phrases.tran_cn: 进口许可证；入境许可证；入境证
(旧)请允许我（提出建议或表达意图之前的礼貌语）
如果…许可的话，如 果…允许的话

trans.tran_en: an official written statement giving you the right to do something
to allow something to happen, especially by an official decision, rule, or law
